storyNode.teaserText: The town blacksmith comes to you with an interesting proposal...
storyNode.eventText: The blacksmith stands before you, twisting his beard in excitement. He's hoping that you can fund the creation of ornate metal-worked holy symbols for your burgeoning faith.

outcome.text: The blacksmith hefts the purse of coins and hurries off, promising great results.
The blacksmith looks dissappointed, but bows slowly and walks away.

storyNode.teaserText: One of the villagers wants to inform you of a strange happening...
storyNode.eventText: Ulrich said the black crow was lucky, I saw one last night and now my crops are dead.

outcome.text: The villagers are a bit more weary of rumors passed on from others, they'd rather defer to you on such matters.

storyNode.teaserText: A happy occurence is cause for consecration...
storyNode.eventText: Shepard has had a new lamb born and wants you to come over the consecrate the flock.

choice.text: You take the time to go and consecrate the large flock.

outcome.text: The villagers all attend the ceremony, scholars taking note of the work you've done for the people.

choice.text: You say no, there is not time for that as you have more important matters to attend to.

outcome.text: The shepard is disappointed to be turned away.

storyNode.teaserText: A chance to increase your wealthMetric approaches, but at a cost.
storyNode.eventText: Butcher has a problem with people getting sick from his meat, and wants you to tell them they’re not living a moral enough life

choice.text: Take his money and preach ot the people.

outcome.text: Preaching to the people lines your pockets, but it only decreases the trustMetric and moralityMetric of your followers as disease kills them off.

choice.text: Reject making false claims to your people.

outcome.text: The butcher denounces your abilities in response to your rejection of making these claims, and they come to trustMetric you more as their health improves.

storyNode.eventText: The witch from the outskirts needs help gathering truffles but the local priests are in the way, and she is willing to pray to your god in return.

choice.text: Help her by ensuring her path is clear.

outcome.text: Seeing you help the witch, your followers grow distrustMetricful of you despite your giving nature.

choice.text: Deny her aid, risking her wrath.

outcome.text: The curse of an angered witch echoes your halls, and superstitionMetric runs amok amongst your people.

storyNode.teaserText: A villager desparate for your help arrives.
storyNode.eventText: The mother wants to have a baby, asks for ingredient for fertility. She does not have the coin to buy it herself and is appealing to your good nature.

choice.text: Give her the coin she needs to buy the ingredient.

outcome.text: Your show of charityMetric at personal cost does not go unnoticed, but nor does your decrease in wealthMetric.

choice.text: Suggest she seek out new employment to save up for the ingredient.

outcome.text: The mother leaves upset as you were her last resort.

choice.text: Flatly deny her any aid with such personal matters.

outcome.text: The mother leaves angry that you will not even offer her advice. trustMetric decreases as it becomes apparent you're not invested in the personal lives of your people.

storyNode.teaserText: Take some time to walk among the people.
storyNode.eventText: Walking along you pass the village drunk passed out naked in the street. Do you leave him or take him in?

choice.text: You pass by, averting your gaze.

outcome.text: The people look upon the man with scorn and mocking gazes.

choice.text: You toss a blanket around the man and clothe and feed him, taking care of him until he sobers up.

outcome.text: Others see your act of kindness for the man and moved by the act of charityMetric.

storyNode.eventText: You are approached by someone fearful of a fiend in their basement, you investigate and wake up suddenly somewhere in the woods
Farmer finds meteor in field, they need you to go investigate the meaning of it.

storyNode.teaserText: You feel disconnected from the petitions today, something else is on your mind...
storyNode.eventText: As a noble from a nearby town confides in you, you are suddenly overcome and interrupt them ranting about the state of the stars and the great tragedy that is your existence.

storyNode.teaserText: A deep paranoia has followed you from your sleep...
storyNode.eventText: The town baker just wants to have a confession about rising cost of supplies, but you’re hearing incessant whispering that you’re not sure where they’re coming from and quickly excuse yourself.

storyNode.teaserText: A defender of the city visits.
storyNode.eventText: Night watch wants you to stand watch with him because he’s heard rumors of vampires in the area.

outcome.text: The view of the city, with candlit huts and smoke lazily rising from fires, gives you a sense of peace and comfort you haven't known in a long time.
